## Native cursors

```md
- auto
- default
- none
- context-menu
- help
- pointer
- progress
- wait
- cell
- crosshair
- text
- vertical-text
- alias
- copy
- move
- no-drop
  not-allowed
- grab
- grabbing
- e-resize
- n-resize
- ne-resize
- nw-resize
  s-resize
- se-resize
- sw-resize
- w-resize
- ew-resize
- ns-resize
- nesw-resize
- nwse-resize
- col-resize
- row-resize
- all-scroll
- zoom-in
- zoom-out;
```

## Custom cursors

```css
/* URL, with a keyword fallback */
cursor: url(hand.cur), pointer;

/* URL and coordinates, with a keyword fallback */
cursor: url(cursor1.png) 4 12, auto;
cursor: url(cursor2.png) 2 2, pointer;
```

## Massive cursor

For everything

```css
body {
  cursor: url(data:image/png;base64,),
    auto;
}
```

or only on links

```css
a {
  cursor: url(data:image/png;base64,),
    auto !important;
}
```
